pr_title: Use new function registry for all existing window functions.

timeline.message: Use new function registry for the row_number window function.

timeline.bodyText: not sure about this specific case, though.
timeline.author: kovrus

replies.bodyText: The new outcome is fine, the signature binder don't support implicit literal downcasts which the old FuncParams did. This is known and should be re-added later on on a different level as this is mostly lucene related.
replies.author: seut

timeline.message: Use new function registry for nth/last/first value window functions.
Use new function registry for offset window functions.
Use new function registry for the row_number window function.
Use new function registry for the row_number window function.
